panels.description: Shows Dockerhub pull requests over rolling 1H average.

targets.expr: avg(count_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | (log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request", request_url=~".*/api/docker/.*/blobs/.*", repo!="", artifact!="", (request_method="HEAD" or request_method="GET"))[1h]))

panels.title: Dockerhub Pull Requests Rolling 1H Average

panels.description: Shows Dockerhub pull requests over the time period.

targets.expr: sum(count_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | (log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request", request_url=~".*/api/docker/.*/blobs/.*", repo!="", artifact!="", (request_method="HEAD" or request_method="GET"))[1h]))

panels.title: Dockerhub Pull Requests

panels.description: Shows the top users making docker pull requests.

targets.expr: topk(10,sum by (username) (count_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | (log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.access", action_response = "ACCEPTED DEPLOY", repo_path=~".*_uploads.*") [1h])))

panels.title: Top 10 Users Performing Docker Pull Requests

panels.description: Shows the top users making docker pull requests.

targets.expr: topk(10,sum by (ip) (count_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | (log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.access", action_response = "ACCEPTED DEPLOY", repo_path=~".*_uploads.*") [1h])))

panels.title: Top 10 IPs Performing Docker Pull Requests

panels.description: Shows the top images that have been requested.

targets.expr: topk(10,sum by (artifact) (count_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | (log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request", request_url=~"/api/docker/.*/manifests/.*", request_method=~"PUT|HEAD", repo!="", repo!="NULL", repo!="latest", artifact!="", artifact!="NULL", artifact!="latest") [$__range])))

panels.title: Accessed Images

panels.description: Shows the top docker repos that have been requested.

targets.expr: topk(10,sum by (repo) (count_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | (log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request",  request_url=~"/api/docker/.*/manifests/.*", request_method=~"PUT|HEAD", repo!="", repo!="NULL", repo!="latest", artifact!="", artifact!="NULL", artifact!="latest") [$__range])))

panels.title: Accessed Docker Repos

panels.description: Shows HTTP 5XX errors.
panels.title: HTTP 500 Errors

panels.description: Shows Artifactory log errors.
panels.title: Log Errors

panels.description: Shows the upload data transfers from this Artifactory.
panels.title: Upload Data Transfers

panels.description: Shows the download data transfers from this Artifactory.
panels.title: Download Data Transfers

panels.description: Shows the top artifacts that have been requested.

targets.expr: sum by (artifact) (count_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | (log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request", request_url=~"/api/docker/.*", repo!="", repo!="NULL", repo!="latest", artifact!="", artifact!="NULL", artifact!="latest") [$__range]))

panels.title: Accessed Artifacts

panels.description: Shows the top repositories by requests.

targets.expr: sum by (repo) (count_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | (log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request", request_url=~"/api/docker/.*", repo!="", repo!="NULL", repo!="latest", artifact!="", artifact!="NULL", artifact!="latest") [$__range]))

panels.title: Accessed Repos

panels.description: Top active repositories by data transfers downloads.

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (repo) (sum_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | (log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request", request_url=~"/api/docker/.*", repo!="", repo!="NULL", repo!="latest", artifact!="", artifact!="NULL", artifact!="latest", response_content_length > 0) | unwrap response_content_length [1h])))

panels.title: Data Transfers Downloads by Repo

panels.description: Top active repositories by data transfers uploads.

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (repo) (sum_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | (log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request", request_url=~"/api/docker/.*", repo!="", repo!="NULL", repo!="latest", artifact!="", artifact!="NULL", artifact!="latest", request_content_length > 0) | unwrap request_content_length [1h])))

panels.title: Data Transfers Uploads by Repo

panels.description: Shows the top downloading remote IPs.

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (remote_address) (sum_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | (log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request", request_url=~"/api/docker/.*", repo!="", repo!="NULL", repo!="latest", artifact!="", artifact!="NULL", artifact!="latest", response_content_length > 0) | unwrap response_content_length [1h])))

panels.title: Top IPs by Downloads

panels.description: Shows the top uploading IPs.

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (remote_address) (sum_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | (log_source="jfrog.rt.artifactory.request", request_url=~"/api/docker/.*", repo!="", repo!="NULL", repo!="latest", artifact!="", artifact!="NULL", artifact!="latest", request_content_length > 0) | unwrap request_content_length [1h])))

panels.title: Top IPs by Uploads

panels.description: Shows HTTP response codes over time.
panels.title: HTTP Response Codes

panels.description: Shows the top users by actions.

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (username) (count_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | log_source = "jfrog.rt.artifactory.access", username != "NA ", username !~ "token.*", username != "_system_" [$__range])))

panels.title: Audit Actions by Users

panels.description: Shows accepted deploys by user.

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (username) (count_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | log_source = "jfrog.rt.artifactory.access", action_response="ACCEPTED DEPLOY", username != "NA " [$__range])))

panels.title: Accepted Deploys by User

panels.description: Shows the denied login attempts.

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (ip) (count_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | log_source = "jfrog.rt.artifactory.access", action_response="DENIED LOGIN", username != "NA " [$__range])))

panels.title: Denied Login by IP

panels.description: Shows denied actions by user.

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (username) (count_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | log_source = "jfrog.rt.artifactory.access", action_response=~"DENIED.*", username != "NA " [$__range])))

panels.title: Denied Actions by User

panels.description: Shows the denied login attempts.

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (ip, username) (count_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | log_source = "jfrog.rt.artifactory.access", action_response="DENIED LOGIN", username != "NA " [$__range])))

panels.title: Denied Login by User and IP

panels.description: Shows denied actions by IP address.

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (ip) (count_over_time({agent="fluentd",service="artifactory"} | json | log_source = "jfrog.rt.artifactory.access", action_response=~"DENIED.*", username != "NA " [$__range])))

panels.title: Denied Actions by IP
